dialogue.content: My lower back gets sore when I sit too long.
Does it improve when you stand up and move around?
Yes, but I forget to take breaks when I'm focused.
Got it. Do you have any equipment at home, like a standing desk or foam roller?
Not really. Just a normal chair and a laptop.
Okay. Would you rather do quick micro-breaks or a short routine once a day?
Perfect-small and consistent usually works best.
If the breaks were short enough to not interrupt work, I'd stick with it.

memory.work_setup: laptop on table, chair without lumbar support
